data.text:
@DrNikkiMartinez @AuforGA I hope they fix it because everyone should be able to get them...

 Hope you're well it's been a while since we tweeted

@dreamwithfaith @AuforGA Yeah, I am making the assumption that however the system is set up, it tracks ‘by address,’ because I know that we had to pick which one of us ordered for our house, and I knew people exactly like you kites as well.
@DrNikkiMartinez @AuforGA Thanks Nikki! I know people that have roommates and weren't able to order them because of the one per address... I think that's something I need to fix

@dreamwithfaith @AuforGA Good question, I am not saying for a certainty, but my guess is ‘by address’ not by last name at address,’ so my husband and I at the same address I know for s certainty can’t order four each, so my guess is that they’ll assume some connection.
@AuforGA @DrNikkiMartinez What about the people that have roommates and can't order them because they live at that address and only one person can get them asking for a friend
@AuforGA The tests were shown to have chemicals in them that were dangerous. Are we sure we should be promoting these?  https://t.co/3oGA3m4Cpk
@AuforGA @b140tweet Thanks for the info. I ordered ours.
